text: أَفَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ رِضۡوَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَنۢ بَآءَ بِسَخَطٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
translation: 162. Yallak kacanuu kee leeda edde tanim kataate num kee Yallih Amri cineeh kay naqabu cakkisiteeh kasaara luk gacey jahannam gira orbeyna kak tekke numih inna maay kinni? Hinna, jahannam gira is manxu uma gacsimeynaay!
